Posted By: Shinigami-2099 (3/14/2011 1:53:16 PM)

posts.post_content:
This is basically the same effect as [Volrath's Stronghold](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Volrath's Stronghold).  
  
Advantages of this:  
- Cheaper activation cost  
- Not legendary, so doesn't die to an opponent playing their own  
- Doesn't require using a land slot for something that produces colorless mana  
- Can use this more than once per turn without needing a way to untap things  
  
Advantages of Volrath's Stronghold:  
- Doesn't cost anything to play, so the first activation is cheaper  
- Uncounterable  
- Also can produce mana  
- Enchantments are generally easier to remove than lands  
  
I would generally go with the Stronghold given the choice, but this is still pretty good.
posts.html:

- Cheaper activation cost
- Not legendary, so doesn't die to an opponent playing their own
- Doesn't require using a land slot for something that produces colorless mana
- Can use this more than once per turn without needing a way to untap things

Advantages of Volrath's Stronghold:
- Doesn't cost anything to play, so the first activation is cheaper
- Uncounterable
- Also can produce mana
- Enchantments are generally easier to remove than lands

I would generally go with the Stronghold given the choice, but this is still pretty good.
